data.title: Services and practice groups
data.meta_description: We pride ourselves on the breadth and depth of our legal experience. Learn more about the legal services we provide at LP.
data.text:
Community Association

A one-stop shop for community associations, we help businesses navigate contract review, collections, employment issues, litigation, governance, and more. Our attorneys have particular skill when representing newly formed homeowner associations through the turnover from developer to unit owner control.

Learn More

Corporate

We handle complex legal, tax, and business issues at every stage of representation, working closely with you to understand your business and risk thresholds. We’ll offer our most honest counsel and give you practical advice in line with your needs and objectives. Together we can solve problems—not just identify them.

Learn More

Employment & Executive Compensation

We have experience handling virtually every type of labor and employment matter, and the know-how to help you resolve even the most complicated issues. When you work with our team, you’ll have the confidence to make the tough labor and employment decisions that keep your business moving forward.

Learn More

Financial Services & Restructuring

We have extensive experience handling commercial lending matters for both lenders and borrowers, as well as all aspects of restructuring. Our attorneys are keenly familiar with the market and maintain a vast network of connections, enabling us to provide tailored advice that achieves results.

Learn More

Intellectual Property

Our IP Group provides a broad range of patent, trademark, copyright, trade secret, licensing, and transactional services. We excel at helping clients tie IP decisions and investments to business strategies. Experience a level of sophistication and quality of work exceeding that of larger law firms at an unparalleled value.

Learn More

Litigation

Our Litigation Group works to protect client assets—products, intellectual capital, human resources, and time. We’ll work closely with you to understand your business, articulate goals, and see the big picture. Look to us to help you navigate business disputes and evaluate risks with an entrepreneurial mindset.

Learn More

Real Estate

We act as thoughtful business advisors and deal managers, handling all aspects of the acquisition and disposition of commercial properties. We move quickly to close deals while protecting our clients’ best interests. Anchored in a deep knowledge of the real estate landscape and your business objectives, we’ll help bring your goals to fruition.

Learn More

Tax Planning

Managing the cost of taxes in a proper way is an essential part of business structuring, legal representation, and return on investment. Our tax attorneys are nationally recognized for the creativity, intellect, and pragmatism they bring to the full range of tax matters confronted by both operating businesses and investors.

Learn More

Trusts & Estates

Our T&E Group helps individuals and families achieve their business and personal goals through gift, charitable, and estate planning. We pride ourselves on our responsive and collaborative approach to understanding our clients’ objectives. We’ll protect and advise you with a focus on simplicity and your overall financial picture.

Learn More
